page.shortlink: api objects datacache gridcache object add method
page.description: Add an item to the cache

argument.name: BodyData
argument.description: The data to write to the output stream. The data to write can be character, binary, numeric, or logical.

page.discussion: Context.Response.Write() Write a character, binary, number or logical to the response's output stream. Character and Binary types are written directly to the response's output stream. Number and logical type values are converted to character before being written to the output stream.
